Position
Social Media Brand Manager
Job Description
About PolySwarm

PolySwarm is a cutting-edge cybersecurity company revolutionizing threat detection through its decentralized marketplace powered by blockchain technology. We empower organizations to access the most effective threat detection tools and insights from across the globe. Join our team and help shape the future of cybersecurity.

Role Overview

PolySwarm is seeking a creative and data-driven Social Media Brand Manager to elevate our online presence and engage our crypto-savvy audience. You will be responsible for developing and executing social media strategies that amplify the PolySwarm brand, build community trust, and drive engagement across multiple platforms.

Key Responsibilities:
  • Develop and implement a results-driven social media strategy tailored to the crypto and cybersecurity space.
  • Manage and create engaging content for platforms such as Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, Telegram, and Discord.
  • Monitor social media trends, conversations, and emerging platforms to identify new opportunities for engagement.
  • Foster and grow an active community by responding to comments, DMs, and engaging in crypto-related discussions.
  • Collaborate with internal teams to align social media campaigns with marketing and brand goals.
  • Analyze performance metrics and provide insights to optimize social media campaigns and content.
  • Stay informed on crypto and blockchain industry developments to ensure relevant and timely messaging.
Qualifications:
  • Proven experience as a Social Media Manager, preferably in the crypto, blockchain, or tech industry.
  • Strong understanding of the crypto and cybersecurity ecosystems, with a passion for blockchain technology.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a knack for crafting compelling narratives.
  • Proficiency in using social media management tools (e.g., Hootsuite, Buffer) and analytics platforms.
  • Ability to think creatively and strategically, balancing brand consistency with innovative ideas.
  • Experience building and nurturing online communities on Telegram, Discord, or similar platforms.
  • Basic knowledge of graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Spark) is a plus.
Why Join PolySwarm?
  • Be part of an innovative company at the forefront of cybersecurity and blockchain technology.
  • Work with a passionate, collaborative, and remote-first global team.
  • Opportunity to shape a growing brand in an exciting, fast-paced industry.
  • Competitive compensation and benefits.

If you're a social media expert with a passion for crypto and storytelling, we'd love to hear from you!
